info.title: Cloud DevFest Bandung
info.description:
Cloud DevFest Bandung Mobile Application Backend API
    
    ## Features
    
    ### Participants
    - View and manage event agenda
    - Book and cancel sessions
    - Network with other attendees (QR code scanning)
    - Submit quests and earn points
    - View personal profile and QR code
    
    ### Organizers
    - Check-in/check-out participants
    - Session attendance management
    - Swag distribution tracking
    - Quest completion verification
    - View participant profiles and statistics
    
    ### Booth Staff
    - Lead capture via QR scanning
    - Contact management
    - View participant profiles
    - Search and filter contacts

post.description:
Register a new user.

- **email**: User's email address (must be unique)
- **password**: User's password (will be hashed)
- **name**: User's full name
- **role**: User role (participant, organizer, booth_staff)
- **title**: Job title (optional)
- **company**: Company name (optional)
- **booth_id**: Booth ID (required for booth_staff)

Authenticate user and return JWT token.

- **email**: User's email address
- **password**: User's password

Returns access token and user information.

Authenticate user with Google Sign-In.

- **id_token**: Google ID token from client-side OAuth flow

Returns access token and user information.
User must have an existing account (registered via /register endpoint first).

Refresh JWT token.

Returns a new access token for the authenticated user.

get.description:
Get current user's profile.
[P-PROFILE-1] Show My Profile

Includes `has_duplicate_email` flag indicating if multiple accounts share this email.

put.description:
Update current user's profile.
[P-PROFILE-1] Show My Profile - Edit functionality

Change email address (only allowed for duplicate emails).
[P-PROFILE-2] Change Email for Duplicate Resolution

Validation:
- Only works if current email has duplicates
- New email must be unique and different

get.description:
Get user's unique QR code.
[P-QR-1] Show My QR Code

View complete event schedule with booking status.
[P-AGENDA-1] View Agenda

Optional filters:
- **track**: Filter by session track

schema.title: Response Get Agenda Api V1 Participants Sessions Get

post.description:
Book a session.
[P-AGENDA-2] Book Session

Validation:
- Session must exist and be active
- Session must not be full
- User must not have a booking conflict

Auto-cancels any conflicting session bookings.

delete.description:
Cancel a session booking.
[P-AGENDA-3] Cancel Booking

- Can only cancel before session starts

schema.title: Response Get My Bookings Api V1 Participants Sessions My Bookings Get

get.description:
Get list of all friends.
[P-NET-2] View Friends

schema.title: Response Get My Friends Api V1 Participants Networking Friends Get

post.description:
Add friend by scanning their QR code.
[P-NET-1] Scan QR Code to Add Friend

get.description:
Get all available quests with per-user progress.

Progress includes:
- is_completed: Whether user has approved submission
- For NETWORKING: current_count, target_count, progress_percentage

schema.title: Response Get Available Quests Api V1 Participants Quests Get

post.description:
Submit quest completion.
[P-QUEST-1] Submit Quest Completion

Supports:
- Text answers
- Photo uploads
- NETWORKING quests (auto-checked based on friend count)
- LINK_CLICK quests via dedicated click endpoint

Record a link click to auto-complete LINK_CLICK quests.
[P-QUEST-2] Click Link Quest

Validation:
- Quest must be active and of type LINK_CLICK
- Prevent duplicate submissions
- Awards points immediately (requires_approval should be False)

schema.title: Response Get My Quest Submissions Api V1 Participants Quests My Submissions Get

get.description:
Get progress for a specific quest.

For NETWORKING quests, returns:
- current_count: Number of accepted friends
- target_count: Target number of friends needed
- progress_percentage: Completion percentage

post.description:
Check in a participant to the main event.
[O-SCAN-1] Scan QR Code for Event Check-in

Returns:
- GREEN (success=True) if check-in successful
- RED (success=False) if already checked in or error

Check out a participant from the main event.
[O-SCAN-5] Scan QR Code for Event Checkout

Check in a participant to a specific session.
[O-SCAN-2] Scan QR Code for Session Check-in

Validates:
- Participant has booked the session
- Participant hasn't already checked in

Check in a participant from waiting list (no booking required).
[O-SCAN-7] Scan QR Code for Waiting List Check-in

This endpoint is for participants who show up without a booking.
They must wait until the session starts before being admitted.

Validates:
- Session has already started
- Participant doesn't have a booking (should use regular check-in)
- Participant hasn't already checked in

Check out a participant from a session.
[O-SCAN-6] Scan QR Code for Session Checkout

Process swag claim for a participant.
[O-SCAN-3] Scan QR Code for Claim Swag

Prevents duplicate claims.

Manually complete a quest for a participant.
[O-SCAN-4] Scan QR Code for Quest/Class Finish

Awards points immediately.

View full participant profile and statistics.
[O-SCAN-7] Scan QR Code to View Profile

Returns:
- Full registration data
- Booked agenda
- Check-in history
- Points total

get.description:
List all participants.
[O-PARTICIPANTS-1] Organizer: Get All Participants

Notes:
- Uses service layer; no business logic in endpoint
- Filters by `roles` JSON containing "participant"

schema.title: Response Get All Participants Api V1 Organizers Participants Get

get.description:
Get all pending quest submissions for review.
[O-QUEST-1] List Pending Quest Submissions

Returns submissions with status=PENDING that require organizer approval.

schema.title: Response Get Pending Quests Api V1 Organizers Quests Pending Get

put.description:
Approve or reject a quest submission.
[O-QUEST-2] Review Quest Submission

- APPROVED: Awards points to participant
- REJECTED: No points awarded

post.description:
View participant profile by scanning QR code.
[B-SCAN-1] Scan QR Code to View Profile

Returns:
- Name, Title, Company (public profile)

Add a participant as a contact (lead capture).
[B-NET-1] Add to Contact after View Profile

Converts a scanned participant into a saved lead.

get.description:
Get all captured leads/contacts.
[B-NET-2] View Contacts

Returns searchable list with:
- Name, Title, Company
- Timestamp of capture

schema.title: Response Get My Contacts Api V1 Booth Staff Contacts Get

get.description: Search contacts by name, title, or company.
Get booth information for current booth staff.

post.description:
Complete a BOOTH_SCAN quest by scanning participant QR.
[B-QUEST-1] Booth: Complete Quest by Scan

Awards points immediately. Only allowed for quests designated for booth scanning.

BoothStaffProfileViewResponse.title: BoothStaffProfileViewResponse
BoothStaffProfileViewResponse.description: View participant profile for booth staff (basic contact info only).

ContactCreate.title: ContactCreate
ContactCreate.description: Create contact by scanning participant QR code.

FriendRequestCreate.title: FriendRequestCreate
FriendRequestCreate.description: Create friend request by scanning QR code.

QuestWithProgress.title: QuestWithProgress
QuestWithProgress.description:
Quest with computed progress for the current user.
Use for listing available quests with status and progress info.

SessionBookingResponse.title: SessionBookingResponse
SessionBookingResponse.description: Response for booking a session, includes cancelled sessions info.

UserPublicProfile.title: UserPublicProfile
UserPublicProfile.description: Public profile visible to other users.
